L2_gloss: gunny (coarse fabric, typically made of hemp or jute fiber and used especially for sacks)

paternal uncle[1]
No dedê mıno ke to rê vano. ― This is my uncle speaking to you.
Namê dedê mı Roberto. ― Name of my uncle is Robert.
son[2], O lacê mıno. ― He is my son., Lacê to lacê

the English language
İngılızki zıwanê do rındo. ― English is a beautiful language.
İngılızkiyê mı weş niyo. ― My English isn't well.
İngılızkiyê to zaf weşo. ― Your English is very good.
İngılızki yew zıwano Cermenkiyo. ― English is a Germanic language.)
